man this downloaded amazingly fast, thank you :)

Most of the money from Albums go to producers and record companies. Bands make most of their money off of their live shows. And fyi, the music industry conducted a study that they refuse to publish because it shows that people that torrent spend more money on band merch, concerts and music than people that don't. I for one buy an album every now and then but I attend at least 5 - 10 concerts a year. And I have a shirt from almost every one of them, some of them I even buy the album off the band at the show. I saw Secondhand Serenade in concert and love the guys music. Just cause I download doesn't mean I'm not supporting him in other ways. Stop buying the music industries bs.
